mapper.select: SELECT bdp.name AS caseZzfryname, bdp.cert_num AS caseZzfrycertNum, obd.name AS caseZzfrydeptName FROM ole_base_dept_person AS bdp LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept obd ON obd.id = bdp.dept_id WHERE bdp.id= #{id};

SELECT bdp.name AS caseWqryname, bdp.cert_num AS caseWqrycertNum, obd.name AS caseWqrydeptName FROM ole_base_dept_person AS bdp LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept obd ON obd.id = bdp.dept_id WHERE bdp.id= #{id};

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(bdp.name) AS caseFzfryname, GROUP_CONCAT(bdp.cert_num) AS caseFzfrycertNum, GROUP_CONCAT(obd.name) AS caseFzfrydeptName FROM ole_base_dept_person AS bdp LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept obd ON obd.id = bdp.dept_id WHERE FIND_IN_SET(bdp.id, #{id});

SELECT bdp.id , bdp.name, bdp.cert_num certNum, bdp.dept_id deptId, bdp.if_effect isEffect, bdp.del_flag as delFlag FROM ole_base_dept_person AS bdp
bdp.id = #{peronId}

SELECT p.id id, p.code code, p.name name, p.sex sex, p.nation nation, p.tel tel, p.political political, p.birthday birthday, p.edu edu, p.card_num cardum, p.picture picture, p.duty duty, p.dept_id deptId, p.cert_type certNum, p.mgl_name nameMgl FROM ole_base_dept_person p where p.del_flag="0" and id=#{personIdMp.personId}

SELECT d.id deptId, a.`name` areaName, count(p.`name`) personCount, p.law_type lawType, d.name deptName FROM ole_base_area a LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept d ON d.area_id=a.id LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept_person p ON p.dept_id=d.id WHERE d.is_ps="1" and d.del_flag="0" and p.del_flag="0" and d.if_effect="1" GROUP BY d.id

SELECT d.id deptId, a.`name` areaName, count(p.`name`) personCount, p.law_type lawType, d.short_name deptName, d.mgl_name deptNameMgl, d.mgl_short_name deptShortNameMgl FROM ole_base_area a LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept d ON d.area_id=a.id LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept_person p ON p.dept_id=d.id AND p.law_type=1 WHERE d.is_ps="1" and d.del_flag="0" and p.del_flag="0" and d.if_effect="1" GROUP BY d.id

SELECT a.id areaId, d.id depId, d.name name, count(d.name ) personCount, p.law_type lawType FROM ole_base_area a, ole_base_dept d, ole_base_dept_person p WHERE p.dept_id=d.id and d.area_id=a.id and d.is_ps="1" and d.del_flag="0" and p.del_flag="0" and d.if_effect="1" AND a.id= #{pADBMap.areaId} GROUP BY d.`name`
SELECT id,name,cert_num as certNum,dept_id as deptId FROM ole_base_dept_person WHERE id= #{id}
SELECT u.id,p.name,p.cert_num as certNum,p.dept_id as deptId FROM ole_base_dept_person p left join ole_sys_user u on p.id=u.person_id WHERE p.id= #{id}
SELECT id FROM ole_sys_user WHERE person_id= #{id};

select oba.id areaId, oba.name areaName, count(obdp.name) personCount, obdp.law_type lawType from ole_base_area oba left join ole_base_dept obd on oba.id=obd.area_id and obd.is_ps='1' left join ole_base_dept_person obdp on obdp.dept_id = obd.id where LENGTH(oba.`code`)=6 and obd.is_ps="1" and obd.del_flag="0" and obdp.del_flag="0" and obd.if_effect="1" GROUP BY oba.`name`,obdp.law_type

select oba.id areaId, oba.name areaName, count(obdp.name) personCount, obdp.law_type lawType from ole_base_area oba left join ole_base_dept obd on oba.id=obd.area_id and obd.is_ps='1' left join ole_base_dept_person obdp on obdp.dept_id = obd.id and obdp.law_type=1 where LENGTH(oba.`code`)=6 and obd.is_ps="1" and obd.del_flag="0" and obdp.del_flag="0" and obd.if_effect="1" GROUP BY oba.`name`

select oba.id areaId, oba.name areaName, count(obdp.name) personCount, obdp.law_type lawType from ole_base_area oba left join ole_base_dept obd on oba.id=obd.area_id and obd.is_ps='1' and obd.is_ps="1" and obd.del_flag="0" and obd.if_effect="1" left join ole_base_dept_person obdp on obdp.dept_id = obd.id and obdp.law_type=1 and obdp.del_flag="0" where LENGTH(oba.`code`)=6
GROUP BY oba.`name`

select u.id,p.name as name from ole_base_dept_person as p LEFT JOIN ole_sys_user as u ON p.ID=u.person_id LEFT JOIN ole_sys_role_user as ru on ru.userId=u.id LEFT JOIN ole_sys_role as r on r.id=ru.roleId WHERE u.dept_id = #{params.deptId} AND r.id= #{params.roleId}
SELECT id , name, cert_num certNum, dept_id deptId, if_effect isEffect FROM ole_base_dept_person where dept_id = #{deptId}

SELECT obdp.id id, obdp. NAME NAME, obdp.sex sex, osd.enum_desc duty, obd.law_type lawType, obdp.cert_num certNum, oba. NAME lawArea, obd.id deptId FROM ole_base_dept_person obdp LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept obd ON obd.id = obdp.dept_id and obd.is_ps="1" LEFT JOIN ole_base_area oba ON oba.id = obd.area_id LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict osd ON obdp.duty = osd.enum_value and obdp.duty = "1706" WHERE obd.del_flag="0" and obdp.del_flag="0" and obd.if_effect="1" and oba.name=#{areaName} LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT obdp.id id, obdp. NAME NAME, obdp.sex sex, osd.enum_desc duty, obdp.law_type lawType, obdp.cert_num certNum, oba. NAME lawArea, obd.id deptId, obdp.mgl_name as nameMgl FROM ole_base_dept_person obdp LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept obd ON obd.id = obdp.dept_id and obd.is_ps="1" LEFT JOIN ole_base_area oba ON oba.id = obd.area_id LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict osd ON obdp.duty = osd.enum_value and obdp.duty = "1706" WHERE obdp.law_type=1 and obd.del_flag="0" and obdp.del_flag="0" and obd.if_effect="1" and oba.id=#{areaName} LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

select obdp.id id, obdp.name name, obdp.sex sex, osd.enum_desc duty, obd.law_type lawType, obdp.cert_num certNum, oba.name lawArea, obd.id deptId, obd.name deptName, obd.mgl_name deptNameMgl, obdp.mgl_name nameMgl from ole_base_dept_person obdp LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept obd on obd.id=obdp.dept_id and obd.is_ps="1" LEFT JOIN ole_base_area oba on oba.id=obd.area_id LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict osd ON obdp.duty = osd.enum_value and obdp.duty = "1706" where obdp.law_type=1 and obd.del_flag="0" and obdp.del_flag="0" and obd.if_effect="1" and obd.id=#{deptId} LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

select obdp.id id, obdp.name name, obdp.sex sex, osd.enum_desc duty, obd.law_type lawType, obdp.cert_num certNum, oba.name lawArea, obd.id deptId, obdp.picture picture, obdp.mgl_name nameMgl from ole_base_dept_person obdp LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept obd on obd.id=obdp.dept_id and obd.is_ps="1" LEFT JOIN ole_base_area oba on oba.id=obd.area_id LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict osd ON obdp.duty = osd.enum_value and osd.type_value = "1706" where obdp.law_type=1 and obd.del_flag="0" and obdp.del_flag="0" and obd.if_effect="1" and obd.id=#{param.deptId}

select obdp.picture picture, obd.name deptName, obdp.name name, obdp.sex sex, obdp.code code, osd1.enum_desc edu, obdp.birthday birthday, osd2.enum_desc duty, osd.enum_desc nation, obdp.tel tel, obdp.cert_num certNum, obdp.create_name createName, obdp.mgl_name nameMgl, obd.mgl_name deptNameMgl, obd.mgl_short_name deptShortNameMgl, obdp.cert_type certType, obdp.cert_category certCategory, obdp.other_date otherDate, obdp.lawarea lawarea from ole_base_dept_person obdp LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept obd ON obdp.dept_id=obd.id and obd.is_ps="1" LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict osd ON osd.enum_value=obdp.nation and osd.type_value='1701' LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict osd1 ON osd1.enum_value=obdp.edu and osd1.type_value='1705' LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict osd2 ON osd2.enum_value=obdp.duty and osd2.type_value='1706' where obdp.law_type=1 and obd.del_flag="0" and obdp.del_flag="0" and obd.if_effect="1" and obdp.ID=#{mapGetSelectPersonById.personId}

SELECT bdp.id , bdp.name name, bdp.cert_num certNum, bdp.dept_id deptId, bdp.if_effect isEffect FROM ole_base_dept_person bdp
bdp.dept_id = #{param.deptId} and bdp.id in ( select person_id from ole_sys_user where dept_id = #{param.deptId} and id in ( select userId from ole_sys_role_user where roleId = #{param.roleId} ) ) and bdp.if_effect ='1'
and bdp.name like concat('%', #{param.personName}, '%')

SELECT bdp.id , bdp.name name, bdp.cert_num certNum, bdp.dept_id deptId, bdp.if_effect isEffect, sru.roleId roleId, su.id userId FROM ole_base_dept_person bdp, ole_sys_user su, ole_sys_role_user sru where su.person_id = bdp.ID and sru.userId = su.id and bdp.id = #{personId}
